parameters.query: SELECT message_id, conversation_id, role, content, tier, llm_model, tokens_used, cost_usd, latency_ms, metadata, created_at FROM iana.messages WHERE ($1::text IS NULL OR conversation_id = $1::uuid) AND ($2::text IS NULL OR role = $2) AND (content ILIKE '%' || $3 || '%') ORDER BY created_at DESC LIMIT $4 OFFSET $5

additionalFields.queryParameters: ={{ ['iana-message', $json.action, $json.user_id, $json.channel || 'api', JSON.stringify($json.data || {}), JSON.stringify($json), $json.success !== false, $json.errorCode || null, $json.errorMessage || null, Date.now() - ($json._meta?.startTime || Date.now()), $json._meta?.requestId || null] }}
